itunes:title: #124 - Building a Business with Jessie Pepper
title: #124 - Building a Business with Jessie Pepper
description:
Jessie Pepper of Style & Pepper and the Marriage is Funny podcast joins us on the Being Boss Podcast to talk about building a business that doesn't keep you "boxed in," and evolving and changing when you are the face of your business. Sponsored by Freshbooks Cloud Accounting and Meet Edgar.

—

Listen to more Being Boss shows on our website, on Apple Podcasts, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

Follow Being Boss on Instagram: @beingbossclub

Join the Being Boss Community: beingboss.club/community
